title: Where are the Teemo buffs?
body:
Ever since your nerf to Teemo (and don't even call this gimmicky update a buff) the only buff you've given him his his slow on shrooms back. He's still far weaker than before with the arm time nerf and duration nerf. Given how over powered the other reworked champions are, why is Teemo allowed to remain so much weaker than before. Especially considering he didn't even need a rework and was perfectly balanced.

I know I'm ranting, but I genuinely want some feedback from Riot. I love this game and I love your updates, but as a Teemo main I feel as though you're just nerfing Teemo because some players don't like him. I feel like my favourite champion is being ignored so that you don't have to deal with him. I'm sure most Teemo mains would rather have had our damage nerfed than half our shroom time AND increase the arm time which has made trading properly impossible.

Even if they brought it back up to 7 minutes or put a cap on, it'd still be better than 5 minutes, which is barely enough time to got around the jungle and grow your mushie farm, before the first one you place expires.

1) Teemo no longer has the option of waiting in a bush for someone to come and step on a mushie then kill them, because mushies don't last anywhere near that long. He used to be able to leave lane and go jungling and it was interesting because it was the trade off of lane pressure vs vision/jungle pressure/skirmishing. Now the mushies disappear so quickly, there's little reason to place them further outside of lane.

2) Yes of course he had strategy! You'd shroom up the jungle, then harass enemy flanks. They could follow you into the jungle and you'd have to lead them properly through the pathways properly. Or they could ignore you and take your poke. This was of course after Teemo had to decide to leave lane unpressured to set this up, and commit to jungle pressure and vision instead, a heavy trade off you'd have to weigh up.

Now there's little reason to venture out of lane, so now he's boring as f.

3) YOU are the reason Teemo got nerfed. Instead of being bad and being like everyone who complains that X champ needs a nerf because they're so "OP", learn how to play so that perfectly balanced champs don't need to get nerfed.
